Dear Customers,
Download large files on your laptop, stream content from your tablet and video conference with someone from your phone at the same time... It’s all possible with Honeywell’s inflight connectivity solution, JetWave™.
As the leader in the Connected Aircraft and the master distributor of Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service, Honeywell’s JetWave in-flight connectivity upgrade delivers a scalable and sound investment for your aircraft. Jet ConneX also offers various service plans, tailored to meet the needs of corporate flight departments or private jets owners.
Imagine stepping onto your aircraft and not having to hang up, sign out, or leave the meeting. JetWave is a truly powerful system providing customers with seamless connection speeds from anywhere around the world.
Schedule your upgrade with StandardAero and join the hundreds of aircraft flying with JetWave today.
